string.name: STR_F2P_ACCOUNT_INFO_PACK_INFO_EMPTY_DESC
string.body: There are no records about previous purchases.

string.name: STR_F2P_ACCOUNT_INFO_PAYMENT_INFO_DESC
string.body: You can find your purchased items and bonuses that you have not allocated to a character yet here.

string.name: STR_F2P_ACCOUNT_INFO_PACKAGE_INFO_DESC
string.body: You can purchase packs and items in the shop.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_7
string.body: [Boost Morale] Group Fire Trial Bonus Package

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_8
string.body: [Boost Morale] Solo Fire Trial Bonus Package

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_9
string.body: [Boost Morale] Arena Fire Trial Bonus Package

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_1_DESC
string.body: Allows you to install additional furniture in your studio

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_4_DESC
string.body: A Gold Pack that removes all restrictions.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_12_DESC
string.body: Silver members of the Dark Star receive special bonuses.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_13_DESC
string.body: Gold members of the Dark Star receive special bonuses.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_RU_10_DESC
string.body: A pack that removes almost all restrictions. \nThe restriction on installing equipment is only removed until the Fabled level.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_RU_4_DESC
string.body: A pack that removes all restrictions. \n The restriction on installing equipment is only removed until the Mythic equipment level.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_RU_5_DESC
string.body: The item drop rate and chance of experience points is increased by 20%. The return time to return to the landing site is reduced by 50%.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_RU_6_DESC
string.body: Boost, Manastone enchantment and chance of success of waking up increase by 3%.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_RU_7_DESC
string.body: Reduces the loss of Abyss Points by 50% and increases rewards for fortress battles by around 30%.\nThe Abyss Points for hunting and PvP are increased by 20%.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_GF_5_DESC
string.body: The item drop rate and chance of experience points is increased by 20%. The return recovery time is reduced by 50%.\nYou receive 20% more Abyss Points for hunting and PvP.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_GF_6_DESC
string.body: The enchantment and Manastone socketing success chance increases by 2%, the chances of successful improvement by 3%.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_GF_7_DESC
string.body: The loss of AP is reduced by 50% and rewards for fortress battles are increased by around 30%.

string.name: STR_F2P_PACK_PACK_NCW_4_DESC
string.body: You receive a bonus for prestige members.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_FORTRESS_SIEGE_REWARD
string.body: You receive extra fortress conquest rewards.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_COMBINE_SKILLPOINT
string.body: You can now learn crafting skills.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_GATHER_SKILLPOINT
string.body: You have no Essencetapping quantity restrictions.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_EXTRACT_GATHER_SKILLPOINT
string.body: You have no Aethertapping quantity restrictions.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_SELLGOLD_DAY
string.body: The limit for the sale of items has been increased.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_VENDOR_SELL
string.body: You can now register to sell items through the trade broker.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_VENDOR_BUY
string.body: You can now buy items from the trade broker.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_VENDOR_BUY_EXCEPT_TRIAL_PERMITTED
string.body: You can now buy items from the trade broker (excluding special items).

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_LEVEL_UP
string.body: You can now ascend to the maximum level with your character.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_GUILD_CREATE
string.body: You can now create a legion.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_GUILD_WAREHOUSE_USE
string.body: You can now use the legion warehouse.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_EXCHANGE
string.body: You can now use private shops.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_EXCHANGE_KINA
string.body: You can now trade using Kinah in private shops.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_EXCHANGE_ITEM
string.body: You can now trade items in private shops.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_PERSONAL_SHOP_OPEN
string.body: You can now open a private shop.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_PERSONAL_SHOP_BUY
string.body: You can now open a private shop.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_MAIL_WRITE_WITH_ITEM
string.body: You can now send letters with an attachment.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_CHAT
string.body: You can now use the normal chat.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_CHANNEL_CHAT
string.body: You can now join channel chats.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_CHANNEL_CHAT_WRITE
string.body: You can now use channel chats.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_VENDOR_USE
string.body: You can now use the trade broker's services.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_WAREHOUSE_USE
string.body: You can now use the private warehouse.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_GATHER_LEVEL_UP
string.body: You can now ascend in Aethertapping/Essencetapping.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_COMBINE_LEVEL_UP
string.body: You can now improve your crafting skills.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_TRADEGOLD_DAY
string.body: You can trade with no daily Kinah limit.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_PARTY_MATCH_USE
string.body: You can carry out a special quest.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_HOUSING_MAINTENANCE
string.body: You can now take part in house auctions.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_HOUSING_OBJECT_PLACE
string.body: You can now create additional furniture.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_MAIL_WRITE_TEXT_ONLY_TO_FRIENDS
string.body: Removing the letter restriction (only send to friends)

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_WHISPER_EXCEPT_FRIENDS
string.body: Removing the whispering restrictions (only whisper to friends)

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_VITALPOINT_BOOST
string.body: Use the special Energy of Repose

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_EC_1_REWARD_BOOST
string.body: Increase Rewards from the Empyrean Crucible by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_EC_2_REWARD_BOOST
string.body: Increase Rewards from the Solus Crucible by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_EC_3_REWARD_BOOST
string.body: Increase Rewards from the Crucible Coliseum by %0%%

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME2
string.body: Boosts the number of entries for all Instanced Zones.

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME3
string.body: Removing Level 3 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME4
string.body: Removing Level 4 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME5
string.body: Removing Level 5 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME6
string.body: Removing Level 6 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME7
string.body: Removing Level 7 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_UNRESTRICT_DESC_INSTANCE_COOLTIME8
string.body: Removing Level 8 of the instance entry restriction

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_DROP_BONUS
string.body: Increases the item drop rate by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_RETURNHOME_COOLTIME
string.body: Reduces time back to landing site by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_ENCHANT_BONUS
string.body: Increases chance of success of buffs by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_AUTHORIZE_BONUS
string.body: Increases chance of success of upgrades by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_ENCHANT_OPTION_BONUS
string.body: Increases chance of success of Manastone enhancement by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_AP_PENALTY_REDUCE
string.body: Reduces loss of AP in PvP by %0%%

string.name: STR_BONUS_DESC_BM_ATTENDANCE
string.body: You can now collect an attendance reward.
